The video was published on Twitter on Au: 2020, and has been viewed more than 370 times.
The tweet accompanying the video mention: Shandong's Linyi city experienced rainstorms and floods, resulting in a large number of cattle being washed away.
Linyi and other cities in China: s Shandong province faced heavy rainfall and flooding in mid-August 2020, as reported by AFP.
A reverse image search on Google reveale: 2020. The video showed the overflow of the Zacualpan River in Nayarit, Mexico, dragging cattle after the passage of Hurricane Hanna.
